name: src/application.js
Application
examples: let app = new Application({ container: document.getElementById('my-canvas'), width: 500, height: 300 });

params.name: options.ready
params.description: called when application is ready (need to use loader)

name: step
description: Callback called at every frame to calculate models x,y positions

name: render
description: Callback called at every frame to render models

name: ready
description: Start timer and called application ready function

name: src/container.js
Container
description: Create a new container with a canvas element
examples: let container = new Container({ width: 200, height: 200, background: 'gray' });

name: render
description: Render this canvas into another canvas

name: src/drawer.js
Drawer

params.name: x
params.description: x coordinate for first point of line

params.name: y
params.description: y coordinate for first point of line

params.name: destX
params.description: x coordinate for second point of line

params.name: destY
params.description: y coordinate for second point of line

name: src/event-emitter.js
EventEmitter

src/index.js
src/io.js
io
src/keys.js
content:
/**
 * @type {Object}
 * @property {number} KEYS.SPACE
 * @property {number} KEYS.LEFT
 * @property {number} KEYS.UP
 * @property {number} KEYS.RIGHT
 * @property {number} KEYS.DOWN
 * @property {string} MOUSE.LEFT_CLICK
 * @property {string} MOUSE.RIGHT_CLICK
 * @property {string} MOUSE.MIDDLE_CLICK
 */
const keys = {
    STRG: 17,
    CTRL: 17,
    CTRLRIGHT: 18,
    CTRLR: 18,
    SHIFT: 16,
    RETURN: 13,
    ENTER: 13,
    BACKSPACE: 8,
    BCKSP:8,
    ALT: 18,
    ALTR: 17,
    ALTRIGHT: 17,
    SPACE: 32,
    WIN: 91,
    MAC: 91,
    UP: 38,
    DOWN: 40,
    LEFT: 37,
    RIGHT: 39,
    ESC: 27,
    DEL: 46,
    F1: 112,
    F2: 113,
    F3: 114,
    F4: 115,
    F5: 116,
    F6: 117,
    F7: 118,
    F8: 119,
    F9: 120,
    F10: 121,
    F11: 122,
    F12: 123,

    LEFT_CLICK: 'left_click',
    RIGHT_CLICK: 'right_click',
    MIDDLE_CLICK: 'middle_click'
}

module.exports = keys;

name: src/loader.js
Loader
load
description: Add asset into the collection and dispatch event

emits.description: emit when all assets are loaded

name: src/model.js
Model
description: Base class for every model entity

name: hasCollisions
description: Check if there are any collisions with models

name: src/mouse.js
Mouse
hasCollision
description: Check if mouse coordinates has collisions with object

name: isOver
description: Check if mouse is over object

name: isOut
description: Check if mouse is out of object

name: isClickOn
description: Check if mouse click and is over object

name: isClickOut
description: Check if mouse click and is out of object

Sprite
description:
The class to use sprite image
You can add animations

name: constructor
examples: new Sprite(0, 0, 20, 20, image, [{ frames: [9, 10, 11, 12], name: 'walk', loop: true, flip: false }]);

name: src/ticker.js
Ticker
description:
Timer class
You can stop and start the game

name: src/tileset.js
Tileset
description: The class to use tileset image

name: getTilePosition
description: Get tile x,y positions by id (exemple tile number 23)
